summary: The various many loading screens of Skyrim
descriptionHtml: Someone at [H]ard|Forums requested this, and since I\'ve taken a screenshot for every different loading screen I\'ve seen since 11-11-11, I thought I could help. There are 87 screens in this pack, and I\'ve got a lot more coming! The screens are unaltered and not cleaned up in any way. For example, my character level at the time the screenshot was taken appears in the upper right hand corner of each screenshot. Feel free to do with the screens as you please.
author: alienfast
